info.title: soma
info.description: An open source AI agent runtime

get.description: Check the health status of the service and SDK server connectivity

503.description: Service unavailable - SDK server not ready

post.description: Resync providers, agents, secrets, and environment variables between API server and SDK

get.description: Get the current runtime configuration

post.description: Trigger code generation for the SDK

get.description: List all available agents from the agent cache

post.summary: Handle A2A JSON-RPC for specific agent
post.description: Handle JSON-RPC requests for agent-to-agent communication for a specific agent

get.summary: Get agent card for specific agent
get.description: Get the agent card describing agent capabilities and metadata for a specific agent

post.description: Create an alias for a data encryption key to enable lookup by friendly name

get.description: Retrieve a data encryption key by its alias or ID

200.description: Get DEK by alias or ID

put.description: Update the alias for a data encryption key

delete.description: Delete an alias for a data encryption key

get.description: List all envelope encryption keys (master keys) with pagination

post.description: Create a new envelope encryption key (master key) for encrypting data encryption keys

get.description: List all data encryption keys encrypted with the specified envelope encryption key

post.description: Create a new data encryption key (DEK) encrypted with the specified envelope encryption key
Import an existing pre-encrypted data encryption key into the system
Migrate a data encryption key to be encrypted with a different envelope encryption key
Migrate all data encryption keys encrypted with the specified envelope key to a new envelope key

get.description: List all secrets with pagination (values are encrypted)

post.description: Create a new encrypted secret with the specified key and value
Import an existing pre-encrypted secret into the system

get.description: Retrieve a secret by its key name
List all secrets with decrypted values (requires decryption access)
Retrieve a secret by its unique identifier

put.description: Update an existing secret's value or metadata

delete.description: Delete a secret by its unique identifier

get.description: List all environment variables with pagination

post.description: Create a new environment variable with the specified key and value
Import an existing environment variable into the system

get.description: Retrieve an environment variable by its key name
Retrieve an environment variable by its unique identifier

put.description: Update an existing environment variable's value

delete.description: Delete an environment variable by its unique identifier

get.description: List all groups with SCIM pagination. Supports filtering by various attributes.

post.description: Create a new group from a SCIM Group payload. Members can be specified during creation.

get.description: Retrieve a group by its unique identifier in SCIM format, including its members.

put.description: Replace a group's attributes and members with the provided SCIM Group payload (PUT operation).

delete.description: Delete a group by its unique identifier. This also removes all group memberships.

patch.description: Partially update a group's attributes or members using SCIM PATCH operations (add, remove, replace).

get.description: List all users with SCIM pagination. Supports filtering by various attributes.

post.description: Create a new user from a SCIM User payload. The user will be created as a federated_user type.

get.description: Retrieve a user by their unique identifier in SCIM format.

put.description: Replace a user's attributes with the provided SCIM User payload (PUT operation).

delete.description: Delete a user by their unique identifier. This also removes the user from all groups.

patch.description: Partially update a user's attributes using SCIM PATCH operations (add, remove, replace).

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the API key to delete

get.description: Initiates the OAuth/OIDC authorization flow by redirecting to the external IdP

parameters.name: config_id
parameters.description: ID of the user auth flow configuration to use

parameters.name: redirect_after_login
parameters.description: Optional override for where to redirect after successful login

get.description: Handles the OAuth/OIDC callback from the external IdP, exchanges the authorization code for tokens

302.description: Redirect to post-login URL with tokens set

post.description: Refreshes an access token using a refresh token from the request body or cookie

requestBody.description: Optional refresh token in body. If not provided, will be read from cookie.

get.description: Returns the current authenticated identity based on the request headers (Authorization header, cookies, or API key)
List all groups with pagination

post.description: Create a new group with the specified name

get.description: Retrieve a group by its unique identifier

delete.description: Delete a group by its unique identifier

get.description: List all members of a group

post.description: Add a user to a group

delete.description: Remove a user from a group

404.description: Group, user, or membership not found

get.description: List all STS configurations with optional filtering by type

post.description: Create a new STS configuration (e.g., JWT template or dev settings)

get.description: Get an STS configuration by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the STS configuration to retrieve

delete.description: Delete an STS configuration by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the STS configuration to delete

post.description: Exchange an external token for internal access and refresh tokens using an STS configuration

get.description: List all user auth flow configurations with optional filtering by type

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Filter by configuration type (oidc_authorization_code_flow, oauth_authorization_code_flow, etc.)

200.description: List of user auth flow configurations

post.description: Create a new user auth flow configuration for OAuth/OIDC authorization flows. The configuration will be encrypted before storage.

201.description: User auth flow configuration created successfully

post.description: Import an already encrypted user auth flow configuration (idempotent, used for syncing from soma.yaml)

201.description: User auth flow configuration imported successfully

get.description: Get a user auth flow configuration by ID. Returns the encrypted configuration.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the user auth flow configuration to retrieve

404.description: User auth flow configuration not found

delete.description: Delete a user auth flow configuration by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the user auth flow configuration to delete

200.description: User auth flow configuration deleted successfully

404.description: User auth flow configuration not found

get.description: List all users with pagination and optional filtering

post.description: Create a new user with the specified attributes

get.description: Retrieve a user by their unique identifier

delete.description: Delete a user by their unique identifier

get.description: List all groups that a user belongs to
List all available provider types that can be instantiated

post.description: Create a new provider instance with the specified configuration
Create a new resource server credential
Encrypt a resource server credential configuration before storage
Create a new user credential
Start the OAuth flow for user credential brokering
Encrypt a user credential configuration before storage

get.description: List all function instances with optional filtering by provider instance
Get the OpenAPI specification for all function instances
Handle OAuth callback to complete user credential brokering flow
List all MCP server instances with pagination

post.description: Create a new MCP server instance with a user-provided ID

get.description: Retrieve an MCP server instance by its ID

delete.description: Delete an MCP server instance and all its function mappings

patch.description: Update an MCP server instance name

post.summary: Add function to MCP server instance
post.description: Add a function mapping to an MCP server instance with a custom name

200.description: Add function to MCP server instance

delete.summary: Remove function from MCP server instance
delete.description: Remove a function mapping from an MCP server instance

200.description: Remove function from MCP server instance

patch.summary: Update function in MCP server instance
patch.description: Update the function name and description for a function mapping

200.description: Update function in MCP server instance

get.description: List all provider instances with optional filtering by status and provider type
List provider instances grouped by their associated functions

200.description: List provider instances grouped by function

get.description: Retrieve a provider instance by its unique identifier

delete.description: Delete a provider instance by its unique identifier

patch.description: Update an existing provider instance configuration

post.description: Disable a function for a provider instance
Enable a function for a provider instance
Invoke a function on a provider instance

get.description: List all tasks with pagination
List all unique task contexts with pagination
List all tasks for a specific context ID with pagination
Retrieve a task by its unique identifier
Get the timeline history of a task with pagination

user_id.description: User ID to add to the group

AgentListItem.description: Agent list item for list response

ContextInfo.description: Minimal context information for grouping tasks

CreateApiKeyParams.description: Parameters for creating an API key

id.description: The ID for this API key

role.description: Role to assign to the API key's user

CreateApiKeyResponse.description: Response from creating an API key

api_key.description: The raw API key value (only returned once, not stored)

id.description: Group ID (if not provided, a UUID will be generated)

CreateSecretRequest.description: Request to create a new secret

CreateUserAuthFlowConfigParams.description: Parameters for creating a user auth flow configuration

CreateUserAuthFlowConfigResponse.description: Response from creating a user auth flow configuration

id.description: The ID of the created configuration
User ID (if not provided, a UUID will be generated)

CreateVariableRequest.description: Request to create a new variable

DecryptedSecret.description: Decrypted secret type for list-decrypted endpoint

EncryptCredentialConfigurationParamsInne.description:
Parameters for encrypting credential configuration.
Uses dek_alias to look up the DEK to use for encryption.

dek_alias.description: The DEK alias to use for encryption (resolved to actual DEK id internally)

value.description: The raw credential configuration value to encrypt

EncryptedApiKeyConfig.description: Parameters for importing an API key

dek_alias.description: The DEK alias used for encryption

encrypted_hashed_value.description: The encrypted hashed value of the API key

id.description: The ID of the API key

role.description: Role to assign to the API key's user

user_id.description: The user ID for this API key

EncryptedOauthConfig.description: OAuth2 configuration for authorization code flow

EncryptedOidcConfig.description: OIDC configuration extending OAuth2 with discovery and ID token support

GetUserAuthFlowConfigResponse.description: Response from getting a user auth flow configuration

updated_at.description: When the configuration was last updated

oneOf.description: Machine acting on behalf of a human

ImportSecretRequest.description: Request type for importing pre-encrypted secrets (used by sync_yaml_to_api_on_start)

ImportUserAuthFlowConfigParams.description: Parameters for importing a user auth flow configuration (already encrypted)

ImportVariableRequest.description: Request type for importing variables (used by sync_yaml_to_api_on_start)

ListUserAuthFlowConfigResponse.description: Response from listing user auth flow configurations

next_page_token.description: Token for the next page, if any

oneOf.description: Field is in the OIDC ID token
Field is in the OAuth userinfo
Field is in the OAuth access token response

MappingSource_String.description:
Indicates which token type (ID token for OIDC, access token response for OAuth)
contains the field

McpServerInstanceFunctionSerialized.description: Represents a function mapping within an MCP server instance

McpServerInstanceSerializedWithFunctions.description: Represents an MCP server instance with its associated functions

Message.description: Message domain model (used in timeline payloads)

MessageTaskTimelineItem.description: Message timeline item payload (messages are stored as timeline events)

OauthConfig.description: OAuth2 configuration for authorization code flow

introspect_url.description:
Token introspection endpoint URL (RFC 7662)
If set, access tokens are treated as opaque and introspected via this endpoint

OidcConfig.description: OIDC configuration extending OAuth2 with discovery and ID token support

introspect_url.description:
Token introspection endpoint URL (RFC 7662)
If set, access tokens are treated as opaque and introspected via this endpoint

RefreshTokenRequest.description: Request body for refresh token endpoint

refresh_token.description: The refresh token. If not provided, will be read from cookie.

ScimEmail.description: SCIM 2.0 Email object for multi-valued email addresses

ScimMeta.description: SCIM 2.0 Meta object containing resource metadata

ScimName.description: SCIM 2.0 Name object for user's name components

ScimUserGroup.description: SCIM 2.0 User group reference (for user's group membership)

Secret.description: Domain model for Secret - an encrypted key-value pair

TaskStatus.description: Task status enum matching A2A protocol states

TaskStatusUpdateTaskTimelineItem.description: Task status update timeline item payload

TaskTimelineItem.description: Task timeline item for tracking task history

TaskTimelineItemPayload.description: Task timeline item payload discriminated union

TokenResponse.description: Response body for token refresh endpoint

refresh_token.description: The refresh token (only present on initial auth, not refresh)

UpdateSecretRequest.description: Request to update an existing secret

UpdateVariableRequest.description: Request to update an existing variable

UserAuthFlowConfig.description: The four supported IdP configuration types

Variable.description: Domain model for Variable - a plain-text key-value pair

tags.name: task
tags.description: Task management endpoints for creating, listing, and managing tasks and their messages

tags.name: secret
tags.description: Secret management endpoints for storing and retrieving encrypted secrets

tags.name: variable
tags.description: Environment variable management endpoints for storing and retrieving variables

tags.name: encryption
tags.description: Encryption key management endpoints for envelope keys, data encryption keys, and aliases

tags.name: mcp
tags.description: MCP endpoints for managing providers, credentials, functions, and MCP protocol communication

tags.name: _internal
tags.description: Internal endpoints for health checks, runtime configuration, and SDK code generation

tags.name: agent
tags.description: Agent management and A2A (agent-to-agent) communication endpoints

tags.name: identity
tags.description: Identity management endpoints for JWKs (JSON Web Keys) and authentication
